thread.title: Amy Hargrove-Southward

author: Amy Hargrove-Southward
title: Amy Hargrove-Southward
text: I recently sold my vehicle to WBAC of Turnersville, NJ. I can not recommend this place enough. It was a smooth transaction and I was very pleased from start to finish. I was educated on everything with regards to selling my vehicle and although I kept waiting for something negative to happen, my salesman was open and honest and followed through with everything that he promised. He never pressured me and he never made me feel like my business was not important. Great guy, great company, great transaction. Thank you very much.
